definition: soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body

sentences.english: Thoughts may go exotic night souls, in the open on the Makino erratic.
sentences.chinese: 思绪似异域夜走的魂灵，在空旷的牧野上飘忽不定。

sentences.english: A cihuateteo is the restless spirit of a woman who has died in childbirth.
sentences.chinese: 恶灵是分娩时就夭折的女婴魂灵。

sentences.english: And all my soul and all my every part;
sentences.chinese: 我身体的全部和我的魂灵。

sentences.english: Dead Players do not count in determining distance between Living Players.
sentences.chinese: 死魂灵不在活玩家的距离计算中。

sentences.english: The novel Dead Souls marks the peak of Gogol's writing career.
sentences.chinese: 《死魂灵》是果戈里在创作上达到顶峰的标志。

sentences.english: Discontent is actually a "soul greenhouse" of change.
sentences.chinese: 不满其实是一个改变的“魂灵温室”。

sentences.english: The warrior is able to draw strength from the benevolent spirits of the Fade.
sentences.chinese: 战士能够大黑甜乡中的友善魂灵上罗致力量。

sentences.english: Deep care, like a long cane rooted in people's soul.
sentences.chinese: 深深的牵挂，像一根长藤扎根在人们的魂灵。

sentences.english: You are like my soul, a butterfly of dream.
sentences.chinese: 你像我的魂灵，一只梦的蝴喋。

sentences.english: On the Ghost's turn, he draws cards to get his hand up to four.
sentences.chinese: 轮到死魂灵玩家的轮次时，他抓牌直到手上有四张牌。

sentences.english: The birds of night peck at the first stars, that flash like my soule when I love you.
sentences.chinese: 夜鸟啄食初现的群星，群星闪烁恰似深爱你的魂灵。

sentences.english: Those who see any difference between soul and body have neither.
sentences.chinese: 能看见魂灵以及肉身之区另外人，他两样都没有。

sentences.english: Stepping forth the cure For soul's demise.
sentences.chinese: 为了治愈魂灵的死亡而一往无前。

sentences.english: Innovation is the soul of national progress.
sentences.chinese: “立异是一个平易近族前进的魂灵”。

sentences.english: Hope is the thing feathers -that perches in the soul.
sentences.chinese: 但愿是有羽翼的精灵，它栖息在人的魂灵深处。

definition: soul/spirit/immortal soul, i.e. that can be detached from the body
three immortal souls and seven mortal forms in Daoism, contrasting the spiritual and carnal side of man
